mapper.select: select a.cr_no, cr_name, a.cnt from camping_room cr, (select cr_no, count(*) cnt from reservation group by cr_no) a where cr.cr_no = a.cr_no and cs_no=#{cs_no}

select sum(c.totPrice) totR, sum(c.totComm) totCM, sum(c.totMargin) totM, sum(cancelPrice) totCC from (select a.cr_no, cr_name, a.totPrice, a.totComm, a.totMargin from camping_room cr, (select cr_no, sum(r_price) totPrice, sum(comm) totComm, sum(margin) totMargin from (select cr_no, r_price, comm, (r_price - comm) margin from (select cr_no, r_price, (r_price * 0.1) comm from reservation where to_number(to_char(r_checkin, 'mm')) = #{month} and r_cancel=0)) group by cr_no)a where cr.cr_no = a.cr_no and cs_no=#{cs_no}) c,((select b.cr_no, b.cancelPrice from camping_room cr, (select cr_no, r_price as cancelPrice from reservation where to_number(to_char(r_checkin, 'mm')) = #{month} and r_cancel > 0) b where cr.cr_no = b.cr_no and cs_no=#{cs_no})) d where c.cr_no = d.cr_no

select a.cr_no, cr_name, a.totPrice, a.totComm, a.totMargin from camping_room cr, (select cr_no, sum(r_price) totPrice, sum(comm) totComm, sum(margin) totMargin from (select cr_no, r_price, comm, (r_price - comm) margin from (select cr_no, r_price, (r_price * 0.1) comm from reservation where to_number(to_char(r_checkin, 'mm')) = #{month} and r_cancel=0)) group by cr_no)a where cr.cr_no = a.cr_no and cs_no=#{cs_no}
select cr_no, cr_name, cr_max, cr_checkin, cr_checkout, cr_price, cr_peak_price, cr_type from camping_room where cs_no = #{cs_no} order by cr_no
